alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Central La Paz; Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Parker Valley; Southeast Yuma County; Tonopah Desert; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 25 at 12:23PM MST until February 25 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Arizona and southeast and southern California. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.
